repository.orgName: Staats- und Universitätsbibliothek Hamburg Carl von Ossietzky

msContents.summary: Taittirīyopaniṣadbhāṣya by Raṅgarājamuni. It belongs to the tradition of Nigamāntamahādeśika. On the front cover is written śrīmate śrīnivāsamahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīraṅgarāmānuja(gap of two syllables due to sticker glued over.) deśikakṛta taitirīyyo(gap of two syllables due to sticker glued over.) ṣadabhāṣyam. 2 lines in Granth script are found on the blank folio at the end, which seems to be unrelated to the text.

msItem.title: Taittirīyopaniṣadbhāṣya
msItem.author: Raṅgarājamuni
msItem.incipit: 1v 1 śrīmatenigamāntamahādeśikāya namaḥ (ātasī gurva?) sa ca ayaṃ antatośasthalaṃ śrīyā ājñanā ca labdha śṛṃgāramantya xx mahāhṛtāṃ vyāsaṃ lakṣama 1v 2 ṇayogīndraṃ prapadyātyāt (4 illegible syllables) vi
msItem.finalRubric: 68v 6 iti śrīraṃgarāmānujaviracitāyām upaniṣatprakāśikāyāṃ taittirīyopaniṣatprakāśikā 68v 7 saṃpūrṇā .. hariḥ oṃ śrīmate śrīnivāsamahādeśikāya namaḥ … śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ

support.p: palm leaf is used as cover.

supportDesc.foliation: Tamil numerals in the left margin.

additions.desc: on 1v hariḥ oṃ is written in the left margin.

śrīmate śrīnivāsamahādeśikāya namaḥ śrīraṅgarāmānuja(gap of two syllables due to sticker glued over.) deśikakṛta taitirīyyo(gap of two syllables due to sticker glued over.) ṣadabhāṣyam is written on the front guard folio.

encodingDesc.p: Spaces are added to separate words. Question mark is used to show doubtful reading.

TEI.text:
1v 1 śrīmatenigamāntamahādeśikāya namaḥ (ātasī gurva) doubtful sa ca ayaṃ antatośasthalaṃ śrīyā ājñanā ca labdha śṛṃgāramantya xx mahāhṛtāṃ vyāsaṃ lakṣama 1v 2 ṇayogīndraṃ prapadyātyāt (4 illegible syllables) vi taittiriyyakavedāntavivṛtiṃ karavāṇyamahaṃ paravidyāmārabhamṇo viyataśāntyai devatāḥ prārthayate śanni mitrā śśaṃ 1v 3 nno varuṇaḥ
68v 6 panipat . samāpeti śeṣaḥ .. iti śrīraṃgarāmānujaviracitāyām upaniṣatprakāśikāyāṃ taittirīyopaniṣatprakāśikā 68v 7 saṃpūrṇā .. hariḥ oṃ śrīmate śrīnivāsamahādeśikāya namaḥ … śrīmate hayagrīvāya namaḥ
